title: ARAM CRASHES
body:
Whenever I join an Aram game, right before the character select screen shows up, the game crashes, and "restarts" as soon as the game launches.
anyone else having this issue?

replies.body: Sorry, for the late response, but it seems that the issue, has in fact resolved itself. But I thank you anyways, for supplying me with a solution!

Hey VeroGas101,

Can you try the solutions in the [**Bug Splat and Game Crashes**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) Riot Games Support article and let me know if anything works for you?
